content.html:
Do we have a proposed labscript API syntax and HDF5 storage structure for experiment metadata like this? (I don’t think we have anything comparable at the moment)
I guess we could add cycle_time as a keyword argument of stop() in this case(?), but perhaps it makes sense to work out something more general for other cases we might want in the future?

@cbillington : Also, just to clarify, “shot interval” is actually the entire “cycle time” not just the programming time right? The name made me think the latter (and I wrote a bunch of arguments why it was bad) but then looked at the code and I think it does the former instead (which is what I was going to argue for).
